HOUSE BILL/RESOLUTION HISTORY
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR02574
ADOPTED AS RESOLUTION NO. HR00203
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION EXPRESSING THE PROFOUND CONDOLENCES OF THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES TO THE FAMILY OF HONORABLE HERMINIO G. TEVES, FORMER REPRESENTATIVE OF THE FIRST DISTRICT OF NEGROS ORIENTAL DURING THE SEVENTH CONGRESS AND THE THIRD DISTRICT OF NEGROS ORIENTAL DURING THE ELEVENTH, TWELFTH AND THIRTEENTH CONGRESSES, AND GRANDFATHER OF HONORABLE ARNOLFO A. TEVES, JR., REPRESENTATIVE OF THE THIRD DISTRICT OF NEGROS ORIENTAL
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : MACAPAGAL ARROYO, GLORIA, CASTRO, FREDENIL "FRED" H., SUAREZ, DANILO E.
DATE FILED : 2019-05-28
